title: Maria and Her Teacher
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR110L, Fiction Series
description: Maria and her teacher do many things together at school. A familiar setting, repetitive text, high-frequency words, and supportive pictures make this book a perfect way to start the school year for beginning readers.
reviewWords: clean, read, smile, talk, teacher, write
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify the main idea and details
grammar: Verbs                : Recognize and understand that verbs are action words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word and
